quote: She [Mme des Laumes] belonged to that half of the human race in whom the curiosity the other half feels about the people it does not know is replaced by an interest in the people it does.
quote_letters: SHE MME DES LAUMES BELONGED TO THAT HALF OF THE HUMAN RACE IN WHOM THE CURIOSITY THE OTHER HALF FEELS ABOUT THE PEOPLE IT DOES NOT KNOW IS REPLACED BY AN INTEREST IN THE PEOPLE IT DOES
